# NON-Modifiable Command SOP
## Field hospitals
- It must be designated as a [bold]Secure Area.[/bold] - The field hospital must be designated as such by the [color=#008000][bold]Commander[/bold][/color].
## Primary Landing Zones
- Selected by the [color=#008000][bold]Commander[/bold][/color].
## Conduct of Briefing
The [color=#008000][bold]Commander[/bold][/color] is responsible for ensuring a proper briefing is conducted before any operation begins and personnel are deployed.
- It must be performed in an area where a proper inspection of personnel can be held and where personnel can hear any orders. - Areas that interfere with non-combat personnel must be avoided, for example the medbay. - Briefings at minimum must include all of faction command. - Failure to adhere to attend the briefing when required as stated above will incur neglect of duty charges.
